**Yellow Talisman Ritual for the Ten-Day Saving from Suffering Sutra Recitation Ceremony**

**Ritual Name:** *Yellow Talisman Ritual for the Ten-Day Saving from Suffering Sutra Recitation Ceremony*
One scroll.
Source: *Zhengtong Daozang* (Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era), *Tongxuan* (Cavern of the Mystic) section, *Weiyi* (Ritual Etiquette) category.

---

**Offering Incense**

This incense, nurtured by the Dao of Heaven and Earth, refined by the radiance of Sun and Moon.
It contains the five-phase essence of life-giving transformation, and its fragrant vapor ascends through the hundred harmonies.
All celestial beings rejoice, and the myriad sages attend.
Burn it in the censer to venerate the supreme Dao treasure, the Revered Emperor of the Mystic Capital, the Ten-Thousand-Longevity Heavenly Sovereign.
With this incense offering’s merit, may the imperial vision be steadfast and the holy lifespan boundless.
May I earnestly pray for the longevity of the Northern Pole to match the Southern Mountains.
May the blessings of the talisman be inscribed upon the Jade Calendar, and the lands of Hua and Yi forever benefit from its pure winds.

This incense, born from the Heavenly Essence’s brilliance, its roots coiled in the Moon’s Cavern.
Its mighty fragrance permeates the Nine Heavens, able to return lost souls and restore wandering spirits;
Its essence flows through the Eight Extremes, granting those who receive it the power to revive the dead.
Burn it in the censer to venerate the supreme Sutra treasure, the Revered Sovereign of the Great Unity Saving from Suffering.

With this incense offering’s merit, may all souls in the Ten Hell Realms, the Six Paths of Existence,
the Ten Courts of Judgment, and the Nine Abysses of Darkness—
those lost in delusion, harm, or wandering between life and death—
all be liberated from eternal night and the torment of the dark realms,
and may they universally receive the grace of the Three Treasures
and rely upon the compassionate Sovereign’s vows.

May they escape defilement and attain purity.
**According to the sincerity of each participant, recite the Three Refuges and spread the seat with praise:**
"Prostrate before the ineffable Dao, vast compassion that universally saves.
The Sovereign’s virtue shines as the Great Compassion,
and His station is the Revered One of the Eastern Extremity.
He pours forth the nectar of warmth to cool afflictions,
and scatters the enlightened light to illuminate both darkness and clarity.
He transforms without leaving traces—His presence is everywhere;
He responds to each being’s nature—His compassion reaches all.

In His fixed response, He manifests boundless compassion;
In His boundless compassion, He transcends the Mystic.
He observes all as One, and His blessings extend uniformly across the cosmos.
He teaches the sutras, manifesting His form in the Ten Directions;
He saves suffering souls, liberating them from the Three Realms.
He stills the pain of the Seven Paths and Six Emotions,
and halts the torment of the Three Hell Realms and Nine Nights.

May the gathered *qi* accumulate merit and enjoy the great blessings of the Heavenly Realm;
May all beings follow their karmic inclinations and escape the sufferings of the Hellish Courts.
May He guide all lost souls, open the mysteries to all,
and lead the multitude into the Great Vehicle.

Now, with this ceremony, I humbly offer [Name of the Host] as the master of the fast,
and present the soul of the departed [Name] to cultivate and exalt the wondrous model.
With reverence, I open the Orchid Field (of the Dao),
and proclaim the grand rituals of the Three Caverns,
while turning the precious treasures of the Ten Heavens.
I hope the Mystic Vault will descend its discernment,
and may the soul of the departed [Name] be swiftly liberated and ascend.

May the departed [Name] now hear the true teachings,
and instantly escape the realm of suffering;
May he personally receive the blessings,
and attain the path of the Immortals.

Further, may all souls bound in the dark prisons,
and those who harbor grudges against the living,
all be saved and freed from the cycle of rebirth.
Now, I request all assembled allies
to each bring their sincerest intentions into the chamber.
With pure resolve and tranquil heart,
and upright body and focused mind,
follow the sutra’s law in sequence.

**When entering the ritual platform, kneel and present to the East:**
All in attendance, with utmost reverence and fear,
prostrate with bows, twice kneel, and pray:
"To the Eastern Jade Treasure Sovereign of the Heavenly Court,
to the Saving from Suffering True Person of the Eastern Quarter,
and to the childlike *Wu’ang* (Unrestricted) True Assembly—
We humbly gaze upon Your holy compassion,
and earnestly pray for Your Mystic Discernment.

Your station is at the *Zhen* (Shock) position,
and all life depends upon Your molding and refining.
When spring stirs the Yang warmth,
nothing fails to benefit from Your creative transformation.
The Golden Elixir begins its alchemy,
and the Wood virtue spreads its luster.

We dare to pray for life at Your sacred command,
and thus You issue talismans to the crooked offices.
Without Your boundless creation,
it would be difficult to attain Your profound grace.

We pray that Your green palanquin and elixir carriage come to inspect the gathering of the Ten Truths,
and that Your precious scrolls and sacred texts
surround and fulfill this one cycle’s merit.

Our humble offerings are insufficient to match Your holy might,
and our sincere prayers are boundless.
The assembly is devout—
we now respectfully present our request.

We pray for Your sacred blessings:
scatter flowers, recite the *Hosted Life* praises,
and ascend to the seat to perform the first cycle of the sutra.

We have heard that within the fragrant groves of incense,
the sutras of Saving from Suffering are always proclaimed;
and in the Eastern Extremity Palace,
the virtues of boundless generosity and wide-reaching compassion are practiced.
The Great Compassionate and Benevolent is called the Saving from Suffering Heavenly Sovereign.
In response to our prayers, He descends His compassion,
and follows our voices to fulfill our desires.

He vows to save all beings,
and has done so in countless kalpas.
Now, as He ascends to the seat,
we speak in unison and recite the wondrous sutras,
praising His enlightened title.
We offer [Name of the Host] as the master of the fast,
and present the soul of the departed [Name].
Relying upon the wondrous power of the good cause,
we dissolve the countless kalpas’ sins and transgressions.
May the departed [Name] be exempt from the Eastern Court’s scrutiny,
and directly proceed to the realm of boundless purity.

The assembly is devout—
we now recite the sutra together in unison.
When the sutra is finished,
we return to the Eastern side once more.

**All in attendance, with utmost reverence and fear:**
We prostrate with bows, twice kneel, and pray:
"To the Eastern Jade Treasure Sovereign of the Heavenly Court,
in response to our prayers, His light shines forth across the Ten Directions,
and His voice of salvation echoes through countless kalpas.
We earnestly pray for His compassionate descent,
and dare not forget to take refuge in His command.

We have heard that within the fragrant groves of incense,
the sutras of Saving from Suffering are always proclaimed;
and in the Eastern Extremity Palace,
the virtues of boundless generosity and wide-reaching compassion are practiced.
The Great Compassionate and Benevolent is called the Saving from Suffering Heavenly Sovereign.
In response to our prayers, He descends His compassion,
and follows our voices to fulfill our desires.

He vows to save all beings,
and has done so in countless kalpas.
Now, as He ascends to the seat,
we speak in unison and recite the wondrous sutras,
praising His enlightened title.
We offer [Name of the Host] as the master of the fast,
and present the soul of the departed [Name] to the realm of the Immortals.

We pray for the power of the sacred talismans to liberate him from suffering and delusion,
and may he depart the dark Eastern realm of confusion
to ascend to the fragrant groves of wisdom and tranquility.
All talismans of the *Taishang* (Supreme Sovereign) are now proclaimed.
**Proclaim the talismans, open the gates, and send the Sovereign.**

**Now present to the South, kneeling and praying:**
All in attendance, with utmost reverence and fear,
prostrate with bows, twice kneel, and pray:
"To the Southern Mystic True Sovereign of the Ten-Thousand Blessings,
to the Saving from Suffering True Person of the Southern Quarter,
and to the childlike *Wu’ang* (Unrestricted) True Assembly—"

**Now present to the East, kneeling and praying:**

With reverence and humility, we gaze upon the Sovereign’s boundless compassion,
and pray for his gracious return to the hallowed Daoist furnace.

For the virtue of his radiant brilliance has departed from his station,
yet his luminous light pierces near and far—
illuminating the Southern Netherworld,
where his divine power shapes the clay of souls amid the boundless depths.

He twice refines the great medicine within the cauldron,
and fully restores the lifeless bones beneath the earth.
Dare we beseech the sacred command from the Spirit’s Office,
that the talismans may now be proclaimed in the Curved Palace?

Not by mere mortal craft nor by grand creation
can we contain the Sovereign’s profound benevolence.

We pray for the jade-litters and crimson chariots to descend,
and examine the assembly of the Ten True Ones.
With the treasured scriptures and sacred texts,
may the merit of two full recitations be attained.

Though unworthy, we presume to invoke the Sovereign’s might,
our humble pleas beyond measure.
The gathered dharma-assembly, with pious sincerity,
now humbly petitions:

*"Invite the Sovereign, scatter the flowers, and raise the seat,*
*to perform the second recitation of the Sutra.*

We have heard that the Primordial Sovereign of the Dao,
once within the Fragrant Grove of the Garden,
proclaimed the Law-Solving True Person,
and praised the Great Benevolent and Compassionate One,
saying that to guide the departed from the Nine Abysses,
one must first ponder deeply, focus the mind, and extol their virtues.

May the merit of that past guidance be vast and enduring,
and may the Sovereign now look upon our present resolve to take refuge.

With the current elevation into the Sutra-seat,
all voices harmonize in prayer.
We chant the wondrous scriptures,
and extol the Sovereign’s noble name.

We offer [Name] as the host of the fast,
to meritously recommend the soul of the departed [Name],
that it may be free from all transgressions.
May he, through the power of the good cause,
be absolved of countless kalpas’ sins and errors,
and escape the Southern Quarter’s tribunal of judgment,
directly ascending to the realm of the True Elder of the Boundless Void.

The dharma-assembly, with pious sincerity,
unites in voice to recite the scriptures.
Upon completion, we return again to the Eastern Quarter."*

The assembled faithful, humbly awestruck, now behold the Saintly One’s descent as the Celestial *qi* returns to the body, sensing the natural separation of forms.

In the dust-mote realm, the transformation is displayed—manifesting the singular cause of change.

The merit and virtue are immeasurable, and the resolve to take refuge is most earnest.

Seeing the Pure Assembly of the past, all voices harmonize in unison.

The Master recites the True Scriptures, extolling the Sovereign’s noble name—already completed twice.

We offer [Name] as the host of the fast, to meritously uplift the departed soul [Name], guiding it to rebirth in the Immortal realm.

Humbly, we pray that it may receive the radiant spirit-light of the Sovereign’s grace,
and be led through the ranks of the Celestial Court.

Without constraint or compulsion,
may it forever transcend the Southern Quarter’s realm of darkness and obscurity;
early attain boundless ease,
directly ascending to the Pure Realm of Supreme Transformation’s splendor.

All the Sovereign’s True Talismans are now solemnly proclaimed.

Proclaim the Talismans, open the gates, and escort the Saint to the West.

**Kneeling and reciting to the Western Quarter:**

The assembled faithful, in utmost reverence and fear,
bow with head to the ground, twice prostrate.

We humbly petition the Western Sovereign of Supreme and Perfect Mystery,
the True Person of the Western Land who rescues suffering souls,
and the True Assembly of the Boundless Dao.

May the Saint’s boundless compassion descend,
and pierce through with perfect insight.

Humbly, we note that the *fu* virtue flows in secret,
and the Golden Heaven rides upon the auspicious course.

**Kneeling and reciting to the Western Quarter:**

We humbly expound upon the myriad teachings,
harmonizing with the life-sustaining mechanism of the cosmos’ embrace;
responding to the four seasons’ rhythms,
awakening the enlightening transformation of all sentient beings.

All beings receive the Saint’s blessings,
as the sutra is proclaimed three times.

Daring to petition our fate at the **Spiritual Office (灵司)**,
we thus decree the Talismans at the **Bending Hall (曲府)**.
Not by mere grand creation,
can we attain the profound grace.

We humbly await the **Emerald Palanquin and Vermilion Chariot (绿辇丹舆)**,
to descend and witness the Assembly of the Ten True Ones (**十真之会**);
the **Lingyan Treasure Box (琅函宝笈)**,
to encompass the merit of the threefold recitation.

Though unworthy, we dare to invoke the Saint’s might,
our deepest prayers know no bounds.

The faithful assembly, in solemn devotion,
now humbly extends its plea.

**Invitation to the Saint:**
Scatter flowers, ascend the seat,
and perform the **third recitation**.

We humbly hear that the **True Exegesis of Rescue (救苦真诠)**,
its merit permeating the **Nine Earthly Realms (九地)**;
the **Venerable Sovereign’s Auspicious Title (慈尊宝号)**,
its benevolent thought reaching the **Ten Directions (十方)**.

Extol the boundless merit of the **Saint’s Name (拔领)**,
and praise the **True Exhaustion (真尽)**.

With the present ascension to the sutra seat,
all voices in unison.

Reciting the **True Scripture (真经)**,
chanting the **Venerable Title (睿号)**.

Offered as the **vegetarian master (斋主)**,
to aid and escort the departed souls,
ascending to the **Immortal Realm (仙界)**.

Relying on the **wondrous power of auspicious causes (良因之妙力)**,
to dissolve the **karmic stains of countless kalpas (亿劫之愆瑕)**.

Avoiding the **Western Quarter’s Inquisitorial Tribunals (西方考对之司)***,
proceeding directly to the **Pure Land of the Boundless Dao (法宝无极之国)**.

The faithful assembly, in pious harmony,
unites in recitation.

Upon completion, we return once more to the **Western Quarter**,
and humbly present our plea.

**Kneeling and reciting to the Western Quarter:**

We humbly note that the **Saint’s Name (拔领)** is boundless,
spreading auspicious **qi (祥烟)** to seal the **gates of death (死户)**;
transcending the **Three Realms (三界)***,
ushering in **joyous clouds (庆云)** to open the **gates of life (生门)**.

Gazing upon the **Saint’s Transformation (圣化)** in awe,
our **vermilion sincerity (丹诚)** is earnest.

Witnessing the **prior pure assembly (前清众)**,
all voices in unison.

Reciting and chanting the **True Scripture (真经)**,
chanting the **Venerable Title (睿号)**,
now complete in its threefold cycle.

Offered as the **vegetarian master (斋主)***,
to aid and lament the departed souls,
ascending to the **Immortal Realm (仙界)**.

We humbly pray that the **heavenly light descends to illuminate (天光下烛)***,
and the **blessings of compassion spread abundantly (惠泽滂占)**.

To depart from the **Western Quarter’s realm of darkness and obscurity (冥昧之乡)***,
and ascend to the **Pure Land of Supreme Benefit (利益庄严之国)**.

All the **Sovereign’s True Talismans (太上真符)** are now solemnly proclaimed.

**Proclaim the Talismans, open the gates, and escort the Saint to the West.**

---

**Kneeling and reciting to the Northern Quarter:**

We humbly present our plea to the **Northern Sovereign of Supreme and Perfect Mystery (玄上玉晨天尊)***,
the **True Person of the Northern Land (北乡救苦真人)** who rescues suffering souls,
and the **True Assembly of the Boundless Dao (无鞅真众)**.

We reverently await the **Saint’s compassion (圣慈)***,
and humbly pray for the **perfect insight’s return (洞鉴)**.

We humbly note that the **Northern Quarter’s profound darkness is now illuminated (启至阴而肇运)***,
and the **Sovereign’s virtue is practiced in the Water Palace (坎宫)**.

All things find rest,
and all beings are granted peace.

With the **fourfold proclamation of the sutra (四遍)**,
the **blessings spread far and wide (敷泽覃黎)**.

Daring to petition our fate at the **Spiritual Office (灵司)***,
we thus decree the Talismans at the **Bending Hall (曲府)**.
Not by mere grand creation,
can we attain the profound grace.

We humbly await the **Emerald Palanquin and Vermilion Chariot (绿辇丹舆)***,
to descend and witness the Assembly of the Ten True Ones (**十真之会**);
the **Lingyan Treasure Box (琅函宝笈)***,
to encompass the merit of the **fourfold recitation (四遍之功)**.

Though unworthy, we dare to invoke the Saint’s might,
our deepest prayers know no bounds.

The faithful assembly, in solemn devotion,
now humbly extends its plea.

**Invitation to the Saint:**
Scatter flowers, ascend the seat,
and perform the **fourth recitation**.

We humbly hear that the **Great and Profound Mysterious Scripture (大洞妙经)***,
universally rescues the **boundless suffering multitude (无边之苦众)**;
the **Azure and Profound Heavenly Emperor (青玄上帝)***,
constantly bestows **unwearying compassion (不倦之慈悲)**.

Grace extends to all beings,
and the wish is to **profoundly magnify the kalpas (弘浩劫)**.

With the present ascension to the sutra seat,
all voices in unison.

Reciting the **Mysterious Scripture (妙经)***,
chanting the **Venerable Title (睿号)**.

Offered as the **vegetarian master (斋主)***,
to aid and escort the departed souls.

Relying on the **wondrous power of auspicious causes (良因之妙力)***,
to dissolve the **karmic stains of countless kalpas (亿劫之愆瑕)**.

Avoiding the **Northern Quarter’s Inquisitorial Tribunals (北方考对之司)***,
proceeding directly to the **Pure Land of Boundless Rescue (救苦无极之国)**.

The faithful assembly, in pious harmony,
unites in recitation.

Upon completion, we return once more to the **Northern Quarter**,
and humbly present our plea.

**Kneeling and reciting to the Northern Quarter:**

We humbly note that the **body is but emptiness (体皆虚空)***,
and the **foundation of the cosmos’ *qi* (混元)** is granted.

The **cosmic breath (*炁*)** can be **subdued and compliant (委顺)***,
and it **illuminates all beings (光明)**.

All who take refuge,
shall inevitably receive enlightenment.

Witnessing the **prior pure assembly (前清众)***,
all voices in unison.

Reciting and chanting the **Mysterious Scripture (妙经)***,
chanting the **Venerable Title (睿号)**,
now complete in its **fourfold cycle (四遍)**.

Offered as the **vegetarian master (斋主)***,
to aid and lament the departed souls,
ascending to the **Immortal Realm (仙界)**.

We humbly pray for the **extinction of body, mind, speech, and karma (灭身心口业)***,
and the **birth of wisdom and enlightened brilliance (生智惠光明)**.

To **transcend the Northern Quarter’s realm of darkness and obscurity (冥昧之乡)***,
and directly ascend to the **Pure Realm of Supreme Felicity (定真快乐之境)**.

All the **Sovereign’s True Talismans (太上真符)** are now solemnly proclaimed.

**Proclaim the Talismans, open the gates, and escort the Saint to the North.**

---

**Kneeling and reciting to the Northeastern Quarter:**

We humbly present our plea to the **Northeastern Sovereign of Supreme Transformation (度仙上圣天尊)***,
the **True Person of the Northeastern Land (东北乡救苦真人)** who rescues suffering souls,
and the **True Assembly of the Boundless Dao (无鞅真众)**.

We reverently await the **Saint’s compassion (圣慈)***,
and humbly pray for **perfect insight (洞鉴)**.

We humbly note that the **profound origins of the Immortal Dao (大象胚辉)***
are **congealed into a singular breath (*炁*)** to contain all mysteries;
the **repeatedly profound transformations (重玄化作)***,
are **divided into the Eight Trigrams (八索)** to expand boundlessly.

The **Heavenly Dao of the Primordial (乾道)** flows and prevails,
and the **Mountain of Stability (艮山)** takes its position.

To grant all beings **blessings and fortune (蒙福)***,
we now proclaim the **fivefold recitation of the sutra (五遍)**.

Daring to petition our fate at the **Spiritual Office (灵司)***,
we thus decree the Talismans at the **Bending Hall (曲府)**.
Not by mere grand creation,
can we attain the profound grace.

We humbly await the **Emerald Palanquin and Vermilion Chariot (绿辇丹舆)***,
to descend and witness the Assembly of the Ten True Ones (**十真之会**);
the **Lingyan Treasure Box (琅函宝笈)***,
to encompass the merit of the **fivefold recitation (五遍之功)**.

Though unworthy, we dare to invoke the Saint’s might,
our deepest prayers know no bounds.

The faithful assembly, in solemn devotion,
now humbly extends its plea.

**Invitation to the Saint:**
Scatter flowers, ascend the seat,
and perform the **fifth recitation**.

We humbly hear that the **Supreme One’s Compassionate Sovereign (太一慈尊)***,
**uprightly presides over the Azure and Profound Palace (端拱青玄之左府)**;
the **Profound Mysterious Essence (洞玄妙蕴)***,
universally rescues the **departed souls of the black earth (黑壤之沉魂)**.

All who take refuge,
shall inevitably receive salvation.

With the present ascension to the sutra seat,
all voices in unison.

Reciting and chanting the **Mysterious Scripture (妙经)***,
chanting the **Venerable Title (睿号)**.

Offered as the **vegetarian master (斋主)***,
to aid and escort the departed souls.

Relying on the **wondrous power of auspicious causes (良因之妙力)***,
to dissolve the **karmic stains of countless kalpas (亿劫之愆瑕)**.

Avoiding the **Northeastern Quarter’s Inquisitorial Tribunals (东北方考对之司)***,
proceeding directly to the **Pure Land of the Boundless Dao’s Mystery (妙因无极之国)**.

The faithful assembly, in pious harmony,
unites in recitation.

Upon completion, we return once more to the **Northeastern Quarter**,
and humbly present our plea.

**Kneeling and reciting to the Northeastern Quarter:**

We humbly note that the **vast and boundless source of the Immortal Dao (渺渺仙源)***,
**begins to spread the primordial *qi* (肇布一元之炁)**;
the **profound and expansive scope of the cosmos (巍巍大范)***,
**reveals the Three Profound Teachings (三洞之文)**.

Now we earnestly extend our private devotion,
and pray for the **blessings of compassion (慈悲之泽)**.

Witnessing the **prior pure assembly (前清众)***,
all voices in unison.

Reciting and chanting the **Mysterious Scripture (妙经)***,
chanting the **Venerable Title (睿号)**,
now complete in its **fivefold cycle (五遍)**.

Offered as the **vegetarian master (斋主)***,
to aid and lament the departed souls,
ascending to the **Immortal Realm (仙界)**.

---

**Reciting the Mysterious Scripture, extolling the Venerable Title,**
**Offered as the vegetarian master,**
**To commend and mourn the departed souls,**
**Ascending to the Immortal Realm.**

**Humbly praying that sins be erased from the Black Ledger,*
**And names be inscribed in the Red Scriptures.**

**Emerging from the shadowy Northeast Quarter’s domain,*
**Ascending to the realm of Eternal Joy in the Primordial Boundless.**

**All the True Talismans of the Most High,*
**Now solemnly proclaimed.**

**Proclaiming the Talismans, dispelling the barriers,*
**Escorting the Sage.**

**To the Southeastern Quarter, kneeling in supplication,**
**With utmost reverence and trepidation,**
**Bowing and prostrating, twice in homage,**
**Praying to the Southeastern Quarter’s Good Birth and Compassionate Sovereign of Life,**
**The True Person of Southeastern Salvation and Venerable Child,**
**The True Assembly of the Boundless.**

**Respectfully awaiting the Sage’s compassion,*
**Hoping for the Three Profound Teachings’ discerning gaze.**

**Beneath the Vermilion Gate’s celestial court,*
**The *qi* of the *Dharma Realm* (梵) congeals as palace;**
**Within the Crimson Hall’s precincts,*
**The *qi* of the *Dao* (巽) stirs, gentle and life-giving.**

**A hundred grains know the place of the morning court,*
**Three peaks mark the wonders of the spirit’s transformation.**
**Bathing in virtue’s boundless blessings,*
**Matching the True Ones’ merit without measure.**

**Expounding the Scripture sixfold,*
**Disseminating the *Dao* to all people.**

**Daring to petition fate at the Spirit’s Office,*
**Thus, issuing Talismans to the Crooked Bureau.**
**Not relying on the Great Creation’s might,*
**Nor could we reach the Mysterious Benevolence.**

**Humbly hoping for the Jade Palanquin and Vermilion Chariot,*
**To come and inspect the gathering of the Ten True Ones;**
**For the *Lingyan* (琅函) and Treasure Repository,*
**To fulfill the sixfold cycle of merit.**

**My humble offering risks the Sage’s wrath,*
**My earnest plea knows no limit.**

**The assembly, in pious devotion,*
**Now extends its humble petition.**

**Invoking the Sage, scattering flowers,*
**Ascending to the seat,*
**Performing the sixth cycle.**

**Humbly heard:**
**The vast and boundless scope of the cosmos,*
**Gazing upon the boundless compassion of the Eastern Pole;**
**The boundless and natural flow,*
**Relying on the Three Profound Teachings’ spiritual essence.**

**Praise cannot be exhaustive,*
**Only my heartfelt surrender remains.**

**Now ascending to the Scripture’s seat,*
**In unison, voices recite the Mysterious Scripture,*
**Extolling the Venerable Title.**

**Offered as the vegetarian master,*
**To aid and commend the departed souls,**
**Leveraging the power of the Auspicious Cause,*
**Erasing the sins of countless *kalpas*.**

**No need to traverse the Southeastern Quarter’s Examiners,*
**Directly proceeding to the Realm of True Peace and Boundlessness.**

**The assembly, in pious devotion,*
**In unison, voices recite.**

**When the Scripture concludes,*
**Again to the Southeastern Quarter we go.**

**The Ritual of the Auspicious Dao/Way’s Proclamations**

---

**The Assembly in Reverence Begins:**

*"The station humbly reports to the Sage.
With purple clouds veiled in mystery—
This is the divine honor of the Three Treasures.
The *dharma-qi* of Brahmā pervades,
Regulating the nine heavens’ vital essence.
Mysterious virtue unfathomable,
Yet the sincere heart ever obeys.
Before the purified assembly,
Voices unite in chant:
Reciting the wondrous scripture,
Extolling the Venerable Title—
Now completed sixfold cycles.
Offered as the vegetarian master,
To aid and commend the departed souls,
Ascending to the realm of the Immortal.
May form and spirit both attain perfection,
Soul and essence transcend.
Exiting the murky Southeast’s domain,
Ascending to the realm of wondrous stillness and splendor.
All the Supreme True Talismans shall now be proclaimed.
Proclaim the talismans, open the gates,
Conduct the Sage westward-southward.
Kneeling in petition:
The station, trembling in awe, prostrates with head and hands,
Twice bows, and reports to the Most Sacred Void Sovereign of the Southwest,
The Saving-Suffering True Child of the Southwest,
And the boundless True Assembly.
With reverence, we await the Sage’s compassion,
That You may condescend to pierce the mysteries.
For the two celestial symbols divide their essence,
Binding the hidden mechanisms of the cosmic fields;
The dual yin solidifies its station,
Congealing supreme stillness upon the earthly sphere.
Bearing all things as sovereign,
Upholding heaven’s pole.
The scripture now completed seven cycles,
Its blessings vast and all-encompassing.

The assembly, in pious devotion,
Humbly extends the request.

Ascending to the seat—
Now performing the seventh cycle.
It is heard:
In the void, the radiant consort ascends,
Receiving the Dao’s boundless grace;
In the shadowed realm, the murky depths,
Yet touched by compassion’s mercy.

Voices unite in chant,
Reciting the wondrous scripture,
Extolling the Venerable Title.

To aid and commend the departed souls,
Ascending to the immortal realm.

Erasing the sins of countless *kalpas*.

Directly proceeding to the Realm of Radiant Truth and Boundlessness.
The assembly, in pious devotion,
Voices unite in chant.
When the scripture concludes,
Again to the Southwest we go."*

(Your humble servant) dares to trespass upon the Sacred Majesty, with deepest sincerity beseeching and praying. The devout assembly, in pious reverence, now humbly submits its petition.

We request the Sage to appear, scatter sacred flowers, and ascend the platform to recite the **ninth cycle** of the scripture. As we hear, the True Teachings flow forth, illuminating the dharma-lamp upon the darkened crossroads; the Auspicious Name resounds, guiding the Compassionate Vessel across the Sea of Suffering. All beings, human and celestial, are universally delivered, and all return to the True Dao.

Now, as we ascend to the scripture seat, voices unite in harmony. We chant and recite the wondrous scripture, extolling the Glorious Name. We offer as the host of the **vegetarian ritual** (*zhāizhǔ*), providing sustenance to the departed spirits. Relying upon the wondrous power of auspicious causes, we expunge the sins of countless kalpas.

Thus, we avoid the scrutiny of the **Divine Authorities of the Upper Realm** (*shàngfāng kǎoduì*), and directly proceed to the **Land of Seven Treasures and Azure Celestial Realm** (*qībǎo zǐxiāo guó*). The devout assembly, in pious reverence, chants in unison.

When the scripture is complete, we once more visit the **Divine Authorities of the Upper Realm**, humbly presenting our petition. We pray that the **Formless and Selfless** (*wúmíng wúwǒ*) may guide all living beings; that the **Unwayward and Unwasteful** (*bùmí bùhuāng*) may awaken them to the True Dao. The subtleties are unfathomable even across countless kalpas, yet with sincere devotion, we attain the power of **mysterious communication** (*gǎntōng*).

The previous devout assembly, with voices united in harmony, has chanted the wondrous scripture, extolling the Glorious Name, completing the nine cycles. We offer as the host of the vegetarian ritual, providing sustenance to the departed spirits, and guide them to the **Immortal Realm** (*xiān jiè*). We humbly wish that the **darkness of the soul** (*huǒyì*) may be purified into the **Clear Pavilion** (*qīngshǔ*), and the **sword-trees** (*jiànshù*) transformed into **auspicious carriages** (*yuè*). May the spirits depart from the **Netherworld** (*yōutú*), ascending to the **Azure Celestial Realm** (*bìluò*).

All the **True Talismans of the Highest Sage** (*Tàishàng zhēnfú*), we shall now solemnly proclaim. Proclaiming the talismans, opening the **passages** (*guān*), and escorting the Sage, we kneel and pray to the **Divine Authorities of the Lower Realm** (*xiàfāng zhēnhuáng*).

With deepest sincerity and humility, we kneel, bow, and prostrate ourselves twice. We pray to the **True Sovereign of the Lower Realm** (*xiàfāng zhēnhuáng*), the **Divine Lord of the Cavernous Mysteries** (*Dòngshén tiānzūn*), the **Sage of the Lower Reaches** (*xiàxiāng jiùkǔ*), the **True Personhood Child** (*zhēnrén tóngzi*), and the **Formless Devout Assembly** (*wúyàng zhēnzhòng*). With reverent gaze upon the Sacred Compassion, we humbly beseech Your piercing insight.

We pray that the **vast expanse of the world** (*fāngyuè*) bears all things with boundless faith, and that the **Great Sage’s teachings** (*Dàxiān jiào*) are imparted without prejudice; that the **profound virtue** (*shòudé*) ensures stability and that the **vast foundation** (*hóngjī*) is laid eternally firm. All benefit from the Dao’s power, and all achieve the **wondrous divine functions** (*shén gōng*).

The scripture is proclaimed to deliver all beings in the **Nine Abysses** (*jiǔ quán*), and the teachings are now fully heard in **ten cycles** (*shí biàn*). All receive the merit and attain liberation, ascending to the sacred and transcending the mundane.

We dare to petition the **Divine Authorities** (*língsī*), thus issuing talismans to the **curved halls** (*qūfǔ*). Not relying upon mere creation’s grandeur, yet how can we grasp the profound grace?

We humbly pray that the **jade carriage and crimson palanquin** (*lǜshèng dān yú*) may come to witness the assembly of the **Ten True Ones** (*shí zhēn*); the **jade cases and treasure scrolls** (*lánghán bǎojiè*), to encompass the merit of the ten cycles.

(Your humble servant) dares to trespass upon the Sacred Majesty, with deepest sincerity beseeching and praying. The devout assembly, in pious reverence, now humbly submits its petition.

We request the Sage to appear, scatter sacred flowers, and ascend the platform to recite the **tenth cycle** of the scripture. As we hear, the **Eastern Extremity’s Benevolent Father** (*Dōngjí cífù*), the **Venerable Lord of Azure Mysteries** (*Qīngxuǎn lǎojūn*), pours forth the **dharma-rain** (*fǎyǔ*) to nourish all beings, and spreads the **Compassionate Clouds** (*cíyún*) to cover all realms. The grace extends to the **Nine Earths** (*jiǔdì*), and the blessings reach the **Ten Directions** (*shífāng*).

Now, as we ascend to the scripture seat, voices unite in harmony. We chant and recite the wondrous scripture, extolling the Glorious Name. We offer as the host of the vegetarian ritual, providing sustenance to the departed spirits. Relying upon the wondrous power of auspicious causes, we expunge the sins of countless kalpas.

Thus, we avoid the scrutiny of the **Divine Authorities of the Lower Realm** (*xiàfāng kǎoduì*), and directly proceed to the **Pure Land of Splendid Ornamentation** (*jìngtǔ zhuāngyán guó*). The devout assembly, in pious reverence, chants in unison.

When the scripture is complete, we once more visit the **Divine Authorities of the Lower Realm**, humbly presenting our petition. We pray that the **Supreme True Teachings** (*shàngzhuāng zhēnjiào*) are now fully revealed, and the Dao’s power pervades all.

Wondrous indeed are the **Three Caverns’ Scriptures** (*sāndòng jīng*); supreme is the **might of virtue and spirit** (*wēishén lì*). It reaches the **Clear Pavilion of the Highest Realm** (*qīngdū zǐfǔ*) above and descends to the **Netherworld’s Black Soil and Yellow Springs** (*hēirǎng huáng quán*) below. All are granted transcendence, and all receive the blessings.

The previous devout assembly, with voices united in harmony, has chanted the wondrous scripture, extolling the Glorious Name, completing the ten cycles. We offer as the host of the vegetarian ritual, providing sustenance to the departed spirits, and guide them to the **Immortal Realm**.

We humbly wish to gather the **refined essence** (*wěi qì*), achieve the **mystic power** (*fǎng gōng*), and ascend to the **True Dao** (*zhēndào*). Though transcending the **Three Realms** (*sānjiè*) is difficult, we may directly ascend to the **Heaven of Primordial Origin** (*Yuánshǐ tiān*).

All the **True Talismans of the Highest Sage**, we shall now solemnly proclaim. Proclaiming the talismans, opening the passages, and escorting the Sage, we **chant the scripture in awe**.

The **Scripture** is the direct path, pointing to its way and returning to it.

Practicing the Dao and cultivating the True, saving the living and guiding the dead—unobstructed and boundless in all directions. With this direct path,
when applied to the **refined essence** (*jīng*), one can reverse the flow and enter the brain.
When the brain is full, the body grows strong—this is the method of **root-searching without leakage** and **preserving life for longevity**, the marvel of those who practice as Earth Immortals.

When applied to the **spirit** (*shén*), one attains inner vision and reversed hearing, reaching the utmost emptiness and tranquility, with purity fully established within. Heavenly light shines radiant—this is the marvel of those who practice as Spirit Immortals.

When applied to the **qi**, one can draw the **flying roots** of the Great Compass, inhaling and exhaling the **Primordial Sovereign’s** heavenly breath.
The **qi** emerges from **Kan** and enters **Kun**, forming a **formless body**—known as the **Supreme Heavenly Venerable**—this is the marvel of those who practice as Heavenly Immortals.

Practicing this path:
To abandon **emotions and desires** is to sever the root of birth and death;
To cast off **deceit and falsehood** is to ascend to the gates of myriad wonders;
To transcend all **things** is to surpass the world and emerge from dust.

Practicing this path at the time of **yang vitality** (*yángshēng*), one turns the **Celestial Pivot** (*Xuánxī*), working within the **single breath** to cause **golden essence** to flow upon the crown and **silver waves** to surge open.
With the brain now full, one enters the **accumulation of merit** (*gōngdé*).
Water flows through, the nose opens, the mouth returns to the throat and merges with the **Yellow Court** (*Huángtíng*), refining the **inner elixir** (*zhōng dān*).
When practiced for long,
the marrow fills, the bones harden, and the hundred limbs grow firm and sealed—
**no cold, no heat, no sickness or affliction** touches one.
This is the **manifestation of Earth Immortals**.

Practicing this path,
one maintains inner vision and reversed hearing,
guarding the **True One** (*yīzhēn*) within the **Upper Field of Yellow Chamber** (*Shàngtián Huángfáng*).
Never does it depart, even for a moment.
Though engaging with affairs and using the body,
one’s **mind remains ever warm** (*yīwēn*), warm within the Yellow Court.
In stillness, one guards constantly;
In motion, one remains ever serene.
Serene, one becomes clear;
Clear, one returns to the Upper Field.
After long practice, one attains **Great Tranquility** (*Tàidìng*), then **white light** and **round symbol** radiate, dazzling the chamber.
When someone approaches me,
I know them first—
this is the **manifestation of Spirit Immortals**.

Practicing this path,
one **ingests qi** (*fú qì*) at dawn,
and **closes the breath** (*bìxī*) at night, in stillness.
Ingesting qi means
**consuming the essence of Great Harmony** and the **vitality of the Two Scenes** (*liǎng jǐng*).
When **heavenly qi** enters the body, the hundred spirits become **responsive**.
With **spirit guiding qi**, the qi **lingers long**.
Having obtained its breath,
one accumulates it again and again—
**accumulating water forms seas**,
**accumulating qi forms spirit**.
Spirit condenses and forms the embryo;
a body grows within the body—
this is the **manifestation of Heavenly Immortals**.

Observing my **heart**,
as vast as the **Great Void**.
Observing my **body**,
as boundless as the **Great Emptiness**.
Wandering through all things,
all are **illusion and transformation**,
ultimately returning to **annihilation**.
Not one thing or deed
can shake my **heart**.

My **spirit** is ever serene—
serene, I do not know
the **Great Emptiness** as *me*,
nor *me* as the Great Emptiness—
this is the **marvelous response of the path**.

Thus, practicing this path,
with **idle resolve** and **neglected merit**,
one extinguishes the **Great Dao**—
it will not succeed.

Observing this path,
**common folk** cannot practice it
and thus fail to reveal its marvels.
Common folk without this path
cannot verify its **practitioners’ merits**—
its **effects and applications**.

The **Dao** is the **essence** of the Scripture;
The Scripture is the **application** of the Dao.
When essence and application are both forgotten,
the Dao **becomes luminous**.

Thus, one forgets what is forgotten,
yet does not forget the forgotten itself.

Repeating the **gāthā** again:
*"To become an Immortal or a Buddha—origins differ,*
*Yet all unite in one path, marvelous and complete.*
*Piercing these knots of illusion,*
*No existence, no nonexistence—*
*Yet nonexistence returns to existence.*
**Threefold Hearing of the Scripture**,
**Yellow Arrow Ritual for Saving Suffering**,
**Tenfold Vegetarian Offerings**—
the **Ritual of Turning the Scripture** is now complete."*

chunks.original_text: 黄箓救苦十斋转经仪 经名：黄箓救苦十斋转经仪。 一卷。 底本出处：《正统道藏》洞玄部威仪类。 黄箓救苦十斋转经仪 祝香 此香，乾坤育质，日月凝华。 抱生成之数於五行，腾馥郁之馨於百和。 诸天称庆，万圣临轩。 爇向炉中，供养至真无上道宝玄都万寿天尊。 以此爇香功德，端为上祝皇图巩固，圣寿无疆。 钦愿北极齐年，南山等寿。 箕毕上符於玉历，华夷永被於淳风。 此香，天灵发颖，月窟蟠根。 磅礴九霄，可以返魂致魄； 周流八极，得之起死回生。 爇向炉中，供养至真无上经宝太一救苦天尊。 以此爇香功德，超度斋坛，所荐亡过某灵魂。 洎附荐众魂，尽脱重阴之府，俱登长乐之乡。 福被见存，庆流后裔。 此香，灵烟结乎五岳，瑞炁蓊乎九垓。 为道德香，遍清静境，爇向炉中，供养至真无上师宝十方救苦天尊。 以此爇香功德拔度三涂六趣、十宫九幽、沉迷利害之魂，流浪死生之识。 哀哀长夜，汩汩幽涂，咸承三宝之惠光，悉仗慈尊之愿力。 脱离垢浊，俱证清虚。 按人各恭信 三归依，敷座赞 伏以妙道难名，洪恩普度。 德显大慈之号，位居东极之尊。 洒甘露而热恼清凉，散惠光而幽明洞照。 无所化而不化，在处应身； 因以机而显机，利生接物。 定而善应，慈以玄通。 一体同观，普天均被。 说经教，化形於十方； 救苦魂，超度於三界。 息七趣六情之痛楚，停三涂九夜之辛酸。 委炁聚功，享天堂之大福； 随机赴感，绝地狱之苦声。 接引群迷，宏开众妙。 提携庶类，俱入大乘。 以今奉为斋主某，资荐亡过某灵魂，修崇妙范，恭启兰场。 科宣三洞之洪仪，经转十天之宝蕴。 冀玄穹之垂鉴，度魂爽以超升。 俾亡过某谛听真诠，顿脱离於苦趣； 躬承惠泽，获造迹於仙阶。 旁及幽扃羁执之徒，悉济身后冤仇之众。 俱沾旷荡，尽出轮回。 兹请同盟之士，各运入室之诚。 洁志澄心，端身正念。 一依经法，次第宣行。 入坛至，东方跪奏 具位，诚惶诚恐，稽首顿首，再拜，奏启东方玉宝皇上天尊，东乡救苦真人童子，无鞅真众。 恭望圣慈，俯垂洞鉴。 伏以尊居震位，有生咸赖於陶镕； 春动阳和，无物不资於造化。 金丹初转，木德敷荣。 敢祈告命於灵司，是用颁符於曲府。 匪凭洪造，难格玄恩。 伏望绿辇丹舆，来鉴十真之会； 琅函宝笈，周圆一遍之功。 臣干冒圣威，下情无任恳祈之至。 法众虔诚，谨伸奉请。 请圣，散花，宿命赞，升座 演第一遍经 伏闻香林苑内，常宣救苦之经； 东极宫中，广运博施之德。 号大慈仁者，称救苦天尊。 应念垂慈，寻声赴感。 发弘誓愿，救度众生。 尽亿劫以来，广度人无量。 以今升座，异口同音。 讽诵妙经，称扬睿号。 奉为斋主，资荐灵魂。 仗良因之妙力，消亿劫之愆瑕。 免历东方考对之司，径诣清静无极之国。 法众虔诚，同声讽论。 经毕，再至东方 具位，启圣。 伏以应感分辉，如满十方之界，寻声救苦，愿宏亿劫之中。 仰冀垂慈，敢忘皈命。 见前清众，异口同音。 讽咏妙经，称扬睿号，已周一遍。 奉为斋主，荐悼亡魂，往生仙界。 伏愿假威神之妙力、拔罪苦之迷途。 出东方冥昧之乡，登慧静华林之境。 所有太上真符，谨当宣告。 宣符，疏关，送圣 南方跪奏 具位，诚惶诚恐，稽首顿首，再拜，奏启南方玄真万福天尊，南乡救苦真人，童子无鞅真众。

**Offering Incense**

This incense, nurtured by the Dao of Heaven and Earth, refined by the radiance of Sun and Moon.
It contains the five-phase essence of life-giving transformation, and its fragrant vapor ascends through the hundred harmonies.
All celestial beings rejoice, and the myriad sages attend.
Burn it in the censer to venerate the supreme Dao treasure, the Revered Emperor of the Mystic Capital, the Ten-Thousand-Longevity Heavenly Sovereign.
With this incense offering’s merit, may the imperial vision be steadfast and the holy lifespan boundless.
May I earnestly pray for the longevity of the Northern Pole to match the Southern Mountains.
May the blessings of the talisman be inscribed upon the Jade Calendar, and the lands of Hua and Yi forever benefit from its pure winds.

This incense, born from the Heavenly Essence’s brilliance, its roots coiled in the Moon’s Cavern.
Its mighty fragrance permeates the Nine Heavens, able to return lost souls and restore wandering spirits;
Its essence flows through the Eight Extremes, granting those who receive it the power to revive the dead.
Burn it in the censer to venerate the supreme Sutra treasure, the Revered Sovereign of the Great Unity Saving from Suffering.

With this incense offering’s merit, may all souls in the Ten Hell Realms, the Six Paths of Existence,
the Ten Courts of Judgment, and the Nine Abysses of Darkness—
those lost in delusion, harm, or wandering between life and death—
all be liberated from eternal night and the torment of the dark realms,
and may they universally receive the grace of the Three Treasures
and rely upon the compassionate Sovereign’s vows.

May they escape defilement and attain purity.
**According to the sincerity of each participant, recite the Three Refuges and spread the seat with praise:**

chunks.original_text: 经者径也，指其径路而归焉。 学道修真，济生度死，坦坦荡荡。 四通八达，无碍无障。 以此径路，行之於精，则能泝流入脑。 脑满则能体强，此探根无漏、保命长生之法，乃地仙行此径路之妙也。 行之於神，则内视返听，至虚静一，纯白内备，天光焕明，乃神仙行此径路之妙也。 行之於炁，则能采盗大范之飞根，呼吸虚皇之天。 炁出乾入坤，结成无相之体，号曰太一天尊，乃天仙行此径路之妙也。 行此径路，去情欲则断生死之根，去邪伪则登众妙之门，去万物则超世表而出尘埃矣。 行此径路於阳生之时，斡转璇玑，以运符一息之中，使金液灌顶，银浪冲开。 脑既已满，则入功德。 水通，鼻通，口复咽归黄庭，以结中丹。 用之长久，则髓满，骨坚，百骸固密，不知有寒暑众痾之着人，此地仙之应验也。 行此径路，内视返听，守一真於上田黄房之内，未尝暂离。 虽随机接物，动用形体，一意常温，温於黄庭之中。 静而常守，动而常寂。 寂则明，明则复归於上田，久久泰定，则白光圆象，焕烂一室。 人有来干我者，我先知之，此神仙之应验也。 行此径路，服炁於清晨，闭息於静夜。 所谓服炁者，服太和之精、二景之英。 天炁入体，百神自灵。 以神御炁，炁乃长停。 既得其息，积之又积，积水成海，积炁成神。 神凝胎结，身内生身，此天仙之应验也。 行此径路，观吾之心，如太空焉。 观吾之身，如太无焉。 泛观万物，悉皆幻化，终归殒灭。 无一物一事，能动摇吾之心也。 吾之神常寂矣，常寂则不知太虚之为我，即我之为太虚耶，此径路之妙应焉。 是故行此径路，志怠功堕，泯灭大道，不成矣。 观此径路，非世人修行，不足以彰其妙。 世人非此径路，不足以验其修行之功用也。 道者，经之体。 经者，道之用。 体用两忘，其道乃光。 夫如是则忘於所忘，不忘其所忘也。 重说偈曰： 为仙为佛本殊途，一揆同归妙与俱。 识破这些关捩子，无无无有有还无。 三闻经 黄箓救苦十斋转经仪竟

The **Scripture** is the direct path, pointing to its way and returning to it.

Practicing the Dao and cultivating the True, saving the living and guiding the dead—unobstructed and boundless in all directions. With this direct path,
when applied to the **refined essence** (*jīng*), one can reverse the flow and enter the brain.
When the brain is full, the body grows strong—this is the method of **root-searching without leakage** and **preserving life for longevity**, the marvel of those who practice as Earth Immortals.

When applied to the **spirit** (*shén*), one attains inner vision and reversed hearing, reaching the utmost emptiness and tranquility, with purity fully established within. Heavenly light shines radiant—this is the marvel of those who practice as Spirit Immortals.

When applied to the **qi**, one can draw the **flying roots** of the Great Compass, inhaling and exhaling the **Primordial Sovereign’s** heavenly breath.
The **qi** emerges from **Kan** and enters **Kun**, forming a **formless body**—known as the **Supreme Heavenly Venerable**—this is the marvel of those who practice as Heavenly Immortals.

Practicing this path:
To abandon **emotions and desires** is to sever the root of birth and death;
To cast off **deceit and falsehood** is to ascend to the gates of myriad wonders;
To transcend all **things** is to surpass the world and emerge from dust.

Practicing this path at the time of **yang vitality** (*yángshēng*), one turns the **Celestial Pivot** (*Xuánxī*), working within the **single breath** to cause **golden essence** to flow upon the crown and **silver waves** to surge open.
With the brain now full, one enters the **accumulation of merit** (*gōngdé*).
Water flows through, the nose opens, the mouth returns to the throat and merges with the **Yellow Court** (*Huángtíng*), refining the **inner elixir** (*zhōng dān*).
When practiced for long,
the marrow fills, the bones harden, and the hundred limbs grow firm and sealed—
**no cold, no heat, no sickness or affliction** touches one.
This is the **manifestation of Earth Immortals**.

Practicing this path,
one maintains inner vision and reversed hearing,
guarding the **True One** (*yīzhēn*) within the **Upper Field of Yellow Chamber** (*Shàngtián Huángfáng*).
Never does it depart, even for a moment.
Though engaging with affairs and using the body,
one’s **mind remains ever warm** (*yīwēn*), warm within the Yellow Court.
In stillness, one guards constantly;
In motion, one remains ever serene.
Serene, one becomes clear;
Clear, one returns to the Upper Field.
After long practice, one attains **Great Tranquility** (*Tàidìng*), then **white light** and **round symbol** radiate, dazzling the chamber.
When someone approaches me,
I know them first—
this is the **manifestation of Spirit Immortals**.

Practicing this path,
one **ingests qi** (*fú qì*) at dawn,
and **closes the breath** (*bìxī*) at night, in stillness.
Ingesting qi means
**consuming the essence of Great Harmony** and the **vitality of the Two Scenes** (*liǎng jǐng*).
When **heavenly qi** enters the body, the hundred spirits become **responsive**.
With **spirit guiding qi**, the qi **lingers long**.
Having obtained its breath,
one accumulates it again and again—
**accumulating water forms seas**,
**accumulating qi forms spirit**.
Spirit condenses and forms the embryo;
a body grows within the body—
this is the **manifestation of Heavenly Immortals**.

Observing my **heart**,
as vast as the **Great Void**.
Observing my **body**,
as boundless as the **Great Emptiness**.
Wandering through all things,
all are **illusion and transformation**,
ultimately returning to **annihilation**.
Not one thing or deed
can shake my **heart**.

My **spirit** is ever serene—
serene, I do not know
the **Great Emptiness** as *me*,
nor *me* as the Great Emptiness—
this is the **marvelous response of the path**.

Thus, practicing this path,
with **idle resolve** and **neglected merit**,
one extinguishes the **Great Dao**—
it will not succeed.

Observing this path,
**common folk** cannot practice it
and thus fail to reveal its marvels.
Common folk without this path
cannot verify its **practitioners’ merits**—
its **effects and applications**.

The **Dao** is the **essence** of the Scripture;
The Scripture is the **application** of the Dao.
When essence and application are both forgotten,
the Dao **becomes luminous**.

Thus, one forgets what is forgotten,
yet does not forget the forgotten itself.

Repeating the **gāthā** again:
*"To become an Immortal or a Buddha—origins differ,*
*Yet all unite in one path, marvelous and complete.*
*Piercing these knots of illusion,*
*No existence, no nonexistence—*
*Yet nonexistence returns to existence.*
**Threefold Hearing of the Scripture**,
**Yellow Arrow Ritual for Saving Suffering**,
**Tenfold Vegetarian Offerings**—
the **Ritual of Turning the Scripture** is now complete."*
